Player History
Had first career hit on 4/8/1985, off Storm Davis (PHI)...
Earned first career win on 4/13/1985...
Injured on 3/25/1986 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 5/6/1987 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/3/1989 to a 2-year deal worth $1,170,000 per year...
8/20/1989: Signed a contract extension with Toronto, $1,100,000 per year, for 2 years.
